content.raw:
For now, the only way to use Gazebo on Windows is compiling from sources. I think that by default we should generate optimized code to help the average user that doesn't care about debugging but I can be convinced otherwise.

I changed it mostly because in all the repositories that I remember "Release" is the default value too.
content.html:
For now, the only way to use Gazebo on Windows is compiling from sources. I think that by default we should generate optimized code to help the average user that doesn't care about debugging but I can be convinced otherwise.

I changed it mostly because in all the repositories that I remember "Release" is the default value too.
